These days, Ms. Pechanac allegedly has put her acting talents to use in a different role: as an undercover operative for Black Cube, an Israeli investigative firm.
In a music video, aspiring Israeli actress Stella Penn Pechanac played a blonde-haired woman passionately kissing a man on a park bench.
In a university newsletter, she was a demure brunette wearing a plain blue scarf.
In a modeling assignment, she was a provocatively dressed redhead.
